title: Farm Stay Black Pearl Gold Hydrogel Eye Patch 90g,Elastic,Moist,
features: This eye patch helps your skin become soothing and moisturizing.
Consists of Colloidal Gold & Pearl Powder

How to use: (1) After washing face, clear up the skin around the eyes with a toner. (2) Take out an eye patch with the enclosed spoon and paste it on any desired area of your face. (3) Remove it after 20-30 minutes and gently tap any remaining essence to absorb.
description: The black pearl & gold hydrogel eye patch is formulated with pearl powder to help firm, moisture and sooth the skin for healthy skin.
